notes:
[Planar Cleansing] is one of those effects that just isn't replaceable in limited. It is one of the few cards that can singlehandedly win you the game after your opponent has curved out and you've stumbled.

[Sludge Crawler] is probably a slightly better first pick than either or the multicolour cards because while it's a less exciting card, you're so much more likely to play it.
